K10D0311_H0315:241b-1: a'arya sam dzny'a na ae ka da sha ni rde sha s'u tra /
K10D0311_H0315:241b-3: 'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa'i mdo /
K10D0311_H0315:241b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0311_H0315:241b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0311_H0315:241b-6: bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad kyi
K10D0311_H0315:241b-7: nye 'khor shing s'a la zung gi tshal na bzhugs
K10D0311_H0315:241b-8: te / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe /
K10D0311_H0315:241b-9: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0311_H0315:241b-11: nam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dge slong gis 'du shes bcu gcig mngon du bya'o //
K10D0311_H0315:241b-13: 'di la ma chags pa'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-0: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i 'du @242a *//
K10D0311_H0315:242a-2: 'khon du 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su dor ba'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-3: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims thams cad bshags pa'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-4: tshul khrims thams cad yang dag par blang ba'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-5: nyes pa chen po byas pa dag la'ang yangs pa'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dag la che ba'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-7: 'jig rten pha rol dag la 'jigs pa med pa'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-8: 'dus byas thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-9: chos thams cad la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-10: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam pa'i 'du shes mngon du bya'o //
K10D0311_H0315:242a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-12: dge slong de dag yi rangs te /
K10D0311_H0315:242a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
